ai-tika-vin08t30:31_10: The meaning is this: the garden, the yoke, the upper robes, the lower yoke with the upper robes.
ai-tika-vin08t30:31_11: and having done a patchwork, that is to say, the precincts, even if it is a new pat.
ai-tika-vin08t30:31_13: Associating with the load, they associate with bird, having to be putrid, put into his vessel, and serve the meaning is that it should be honored.
ai-tika-vin08t30:32_0: composed the Vinaya of the Discipline in the Monastic Law.
